body:
@iSazonov, your last commit had 6 failures in `PowerShell-CI-macos`
(These are 5 of the failures)

ConsoleHost unit tests.Redirected standard input for 'interactive' use.Interactive redirected input w/ initial command
```powershell
Expected strings to be the same, but they were different.
Expected length: 7
Actual length:   4
Strings differ at index 4.
Expected: 'PS> 1+1'
But was:  'PS> '
---------------^
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.149.2/work/1/s/test/powershell/Host/ConsoleHost.Tests.ps1: line 413
413:             $process.StandardOutput.ReadLine() | Should -Be "PS> 1+1"
```
ConsoleHost unit tests.Redirected standard input for 'interactive' use.Redirected input explicit prompting (-File -)
```powershell
Expected strings to be the same, but they were different.
Expected length: 7
Actual length:   29
Strings differ at index 0.
Expected: 'PS> 1+1'
But was:  '$function:prompt = { 'PS> ' }'
-----------^
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.149.2/work/1/s/test/powershell/Host/ConsoleHost.Tests.ps1: line 429
429:             $process.StandardOutput.ReadLine() | Should -Be "PS> 1+1"
```
ConsoleHost unit tests.Redirected standard input for 'interactive' use.Redirected input w/ nested prompt
```powershell
Expected strings to be the same, but they were different.
Expected length: 29
Actual length:   4
Strings differ at index 4.
Expected: 'PS> $host.EnterNestedPrompt()'
But was:  'PS> '
---------------^
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.149.2/work/1/s/test/powershell/Host/ConsoleHost.Tests.ps1: line 473
473:             $process.StandardOutput.ReadLine() | Should -Be "PS> `$host.EnterNestedPrompt()"
```
ConsoleHost unit tests.Redirected standard input for 'interactive' use.Interactive redirected input: <empty>
```powershell
Expected strings to be the same, but they were different.
Expected length: 7
Actual length:   29
Strings differ at index 0.
Expected: 'PS> 1+1'
But was:  '$function:prompt = { 'PS> ' }'
-----------^
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.149.2/work/1/s/test/powershell/Host/ConsoleHost.Tests.ps1: line 393
393:             $process.StandardOutput.ReadLine() | Should -Be "PS> 1+1"
```
ConsoleHost unit tests.Redirected standard input for 'interactive' use.Interactive redirected input:  -IntERactive
```powershell
Expected strings to be the same, but they were different.
Expected length: 7
Actual length:   29
Strings differ at index 0.
Expected: 'PS> 1+1'
But was:  '$function:prompt = { 'PS> ' }'
-----------^
at <ScriptBlock>, /Users/vsts/agent/2.149.2/work/1/s/test/powershell/Host/ConsoleHost.Tests.ps1: line 393
393:             $process.StandardOutput.ReadLine() | Should -Be "PS> 1+1"
```

@iSazonov, your last commit had 1 failures in `PowerShell-CI-static-analysis`
Verify Markdown Links.Verify links in /home/vsts/work/1/s/docs/building/internals.md.https://powershell.myget.org/feed/powershell-core/package/nuget/psrp.windows should work
```powershell
retry of URL failed with error: 
at <ScriptBlock>, /home/vsts/work/1/s/test/common/markdown/markdown-link.tests.ps1: line 113
113:                                 throw "retry of URL failed with error: $($_.Message)"

```
